data.text: Elihu finished by saying this:
“Job, be patient with me a little longer,
I will tell you what I have learned from many sources,
I am not saying anything to you that is false;
“Hey, God is very powerful, and he does not despise anyone,
He does not allow wicked people to remain alive,
He always watches over [MTY] those who are righteous;
But if people who commit crimes are caught,
When that happens, God shows them what they have done;
He causes them to listen [MTY] to what he is warning them,
If they ◄listen to/heed► him and serve him, after they get out of prison
But if they do not ◄listen/pay attention► to him,
“Godless/Wicked people continue being angry,
They die while they are still young,
But God teaches people by causing them to suffer;
“And Job, I think that God wants to bring you out of your troubles
But now, you are being punished [MTY] as wicked people are punished;
So be careful that you are not deceived by desiring to acquire money
If you are deceived by those things, it certainly will not [RHQ] help you to cry out when you are distressed;
Do not wish that it would be nighttime in order that God will not see you and punish you,
Be careful not to begin doing evil things,
“Hey, God is extremely powerful;
No one has [RHQ] told him what he should do,
People have always sung to praise him,
Everyone has seen what he has done,
“Hey, God is very great, and we are not able to know how great he is,
He draws water up from the earth and puts it in clouds
The rain pours down from the sky/clouds;
No one can [RHQ] understand how the clouds move across the sky
He causes lightning to flash all around him,
By providing plenty of rain for us,
It is as though he holds the lightning in his hands,
When we hear his thunder, we know that there will be a storm,
